data.Title: Up
data.Writer: Pete Docter, Bob Peterson, Tom McCarthy
data.Actors: Ed Asner, Jordan Nagai, John Ratzenberger
data.Plot: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

data.Title: Blade Runner
data.Writer: Hampton Fancher, David Webb Peoples, Philip K. Dick
data.Actors: Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young
data.Plot: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space, and have returned to Earth to find their creator.
data.Language: English, German, Cantonese, Japanese, Hungarian, Arabic, Korean
data.Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. 12 wins & 19 nominations total
